text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Tumhi apala jivalaga mitra imanadharakansivaya dusarya konala banavu naka (tumhi nahi pahata dusare loka tara) tumaca sarvanasa karanyata kahica kasara baki thevata nahi. Te tara ase icchitata ki tumhi duhkhataca paduna rahave. Tyanci satruta tara svatah tyancya tonduna ughada jhali ahe ani tyancya manata je kahi ahe te tara anakhi jasta ahe. Amhi apalya ayati tumhala spasta karuna sangitalya tumhi akkalavana asala (tara kalaji ghya)
